article.title: August 2012 Galaxy Update
article.content:
The August 2012 Galaxy Update is now available.

Highlights:

  • GCC2012 & GCC2013: slides are there; video is coming

  • Other Upcoming Events and Deadlines

    • Swiss Galaxy Day
  • 29 new papers
  • Open Positions at four different institutions
  • Tool Shed Contributions
  • New Distribution
  • Other News

If you have anything you would like to see in the September Galaxy Update, please let me know.

Dave Clements
